law.text: The commissioner of the department, with approval of the Department of Fish and Wildlife Resources Commission, shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A to govern the fair, reasonable, equitable, and safe use of all waters of this state and otherwise to carry out the purposes of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 446, sec. 6, effective April 12, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 80, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 20. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 1. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. VIII. sec. 30.
